original_text: Then he gave orders to the centurion that he should be kept in custody but have some liberty, and that none of his friends should be prevented from attending to his needs.
korean_text: 백부장에게 명하여 바울을 지키되 자유를 주고 그의 친구들이 그를 돌보아 주는 것을 금하지 말라 하니라

sentences.original_text: Then he gave orders to the centurion
that he should be kept in custody
and that none of his friends
should be prevented from attending to his needs
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 필요를 돌보는 것을 막아서는 안 된다고
